Entries.ancient1flower: Hey @,^^  I hear you've successfully grown that ancient seed I taught you to craft. I’ve got some more seeds for you to try your hand at, if you’re up to it. Try planting these during Spring, but be aware that they’re the last existing seeds of their kind in the whole world. If you want to plant these flowers again, you'll need to reproduce them using a seed maker.^^  -Gunther %item object {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Ancient Flower Seeds}} 10 %%
Entries.ancient1tuber: Good morning @,^^  Congratulations on growing the ancient flowers! Those flowers were extinct and the seeds I sent you were the last ones we had. No other farmer or scientist managed to do what you did!^^ I am giving you another type of ancient seeds with the hopes that you can revive this species as well. These are seeds from an ancient tuber plant. They should be more challenging, but I trust you can do it! Also, don't forget to save some, so you can reproduce the seeds with a seed maker.^^  -Gunther %item object {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Ancient Tuber Seeds}} 10 %%
Entries.ancient1fern: You've received a mysterious package with a note that says: You've made everyone around you happier,so I hope this little gift can make you happy. %item object {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Ancient Fern Seeds}} 2 %%
Entries.ancient1nut: You've received a mysterious package with a note that says: This is a small token of gratitude for all the gifts! %item object {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Ancient Nut Seeds}} 2 %%
Entries.ancient1nut1: Hey @,^^  As a token of gratitude for helping me get the big promotion, here’s a little gift that my workers dug up during the renovation. I’m not sure if this still can be planted, but perhaps you can put it to good use.^^  -Morris %item object {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Ancient Nut Seeds}} 2 %%
Entries.ancient1olive: Hey @,^^  You’ve been a boon to scientific community in restoring several extinct plants, but there is still one missing! This is an ancient olive seed. It's one of a kind and the last hope for this plant. Could you please try to grow it?^^Thank you for all your efforts!^^  -Gunther %item object {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Ancient Olive Seeds}} 1 %%
Entries.legendaryfarmer: Dear @,^^  This letter is to inform you that you are being awarded the Fiona Prize for your significant contributions to the field of botany. In addition to your new title, enclosed is a gift to show our collective gratitude. As president of the International Committee of Plant Sciences, I wanted to write to thank you personally for bringing back seven ancient species long thought to be forever extinct. The specimens that your colleague Gunther have given us will surely fuel new discoveries for many years to come.^^  Sincerely, Dr. Jacob Lewitt  %item object 434 1 %%
Entries.skillschallenge: Hey kid,^^ I hear you've grown some ancient crops. I have a rare ancient coffee bean here and I'll reward you with it if you manage to refine all your skills to their full potential.^^ -Qi.
Entries.ancient1coffee: You've done it again kid, you really are something. As promised, here’s your reward. Keep striving for excellence.^^ -Qi%item object {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Ancient Coffee Bean}} 1 %%

Entries.ancient1flower: 嗨 @,^^  我听说你成功地种下了我教你做的那种古老的种子。我还有一些种子给你试试，如果你能行的话。试着在春天种下这些种子，但要知道，它们是世界上仅存的同类种子。如果你想再次种植这些花，你需要用制种机来繁殖它们。^^  -冈瑟 %item object {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Ancient Flower Seeds}} 10 %%
Entries.ancient1tuber: 早上好 @,^^  祝贺你种出这些古老的花!那些花已经绝种了，我送给你的是我们最后的种子。没有其他农民或科学家能做到你所做的!^^我给你们另一种古老的种子，希望你们也能让这个物种复活。这些是一种古老块茎植物的种子。他们应该更具挑战性，但我相信你能做到!另外，不要忘记保存一些，这样你就可以用制种机来繁殖种子。^^  -冈瑟 %item object {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Ancient Tuber Seeds}} 10 %%
Entries.ancient1fern: 你收到了一个神秘的包裹，上面写着:你让你周围的人都开心了，所以我希望这个小礼物能让你开心。 %item object {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Ancient Fern Seeds}} 2 %%
Entries.ancient1nut: 你收到了一个神秘的包裹，上面写着:这是我送给你的所有礼物的一点小小的心意! %item object {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Ancient Nut Seeds}} 2 %%
Entries.ancient1nut1: 嗨 @,^^ 为了感谢你帮我升职，这里有一件小礼物，是我的工人在装修期间挖出来的。我不确定这棵树是否还能种下去，但也许你能好好利用它。^^  -莫尔斯 %item object {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Ancient Nut Seeds}} 2 %%
Entries.ancient1olive: Hey @,^^  在恢复几种已经灭绝的植物方面，你对科学界是一个恩惠，但是还有一种植物不见了!这是一颗古老的橄榄籽。这是这种植物的一种，也是最后的希望。你能试着种一下吗?^^谢谢你的努力!^^  -冈瑟 %item object {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Ancient Olive Seeds}} 1 %%
Entries.legendaryfarmer: 亲爱的 @,^^  这封信是要通知你，你将被授予菲奥娜奖，因为你在植物学领域的重大贡献。除了您的新头衔，随信附上一份礼物，以表示我们的共同感谢。作为国际植物科学委员会主席，我想亲自写信感谢你们带回了7个长期以来被认为永远灭绝的古老物种。你的同事冈瑟给我们的标本肯定会在未来许多年推动新的发现。真诚的雅各布·勒维特博士  %item object 434 1 %%
Entries.skillschallenge: 我的孩子,^^ 我听说你种了一些古老的农作物。我这里有一颗稀有的古代咖啡豆，如果你能把你所有的技能都发挥到极致，我将奖励你。^^ -齐先生.
Entries.ancient1coffee: 你又来了，孩子，你真了不起。正如承诺的，这是你的报酬。不断追求卓越。^^ -齐先生%item object {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Ancient Coffee Bean}} 1 %%
